Terms of Service

Terms of Service for Beauty Awakening by Chantelle

1. Introduction

These terms of service ("Terms") govern your use of the services provided by Beauty Awakening by Chantelle ("we," "us," or "our"), including but not limited to beauty treatments, online bookings, and consultations. By booking an appointment or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

2. Bookings

  • Online Bookings: You can book appointments online through our website or our booking partner, Fresha. By booking online, you confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete.
  • Appointment Confirmation: Once you make a booking, you will receive a confirmation email or message. Please review the details carefully and contact us immediately if there are any errors.
  • Arrival: Please arrive on time for your appointment. Late arrivals may result in a shortened treatment time or rescheduling, subject to our discretion.

3. Cancellations and No-Shows

  • Cancellation Policy: We understand that things happen, and you may need to cancel or reschedule your appointment. We kindly request at least 24 hours' notice for cancellations.
    • Cancellations made with less than 24 hours' notice may be subject to a cancellation fee of [Insert Percentage or Amount] of the treatment cost.
    • No-shows (failing to arrive for your appointment without prior notice) will be charged the full treatment cost.
  • Contacting Us: To cancel or reschedule your appointment, please contact us by phone or email as soon as possible.

4. Allergy Alert Tests

  • Patch Tests: Certain treatments, such as tinting or lash extensions, may require an allergy alert test (patch test) at least 48 hours before the treatment. This is to ensure your safety and prevent allergic reactions.
  • Responsibility: It is your responsibility to book and attend the patch test as instructed. Failure to do so may result in your appointment being rescheduled, and a cancellation fee may apply.
  • Informing Us: Please inform us of any allergies or sensitivities you may have before booking your appointment.

5. Payments

  • Payment Methods: We accept various payment methods, including cash, card, and potentially other methods as specified at the time of booking.
  • Payment Timing: Payment for treatments is typically due at the time of your appointment, unless otherwise agreed upon.
  • Prices: Prices for our treatments are subject to change. We will endeavour to notify you of any price changes in advance.

6. Liability

  • Treatment Suitability: We will do our best to advise you on the most suitable treatments, but it is ultimately your responsibility to ensure that the treatment is appropriate for you. Please inform us of any health conditions or concerns you may have.
  • Reactions: While we take all necessary precautions, there is always a risk of reactions to beauty treatments. We are not liable for any adverse reactions that may occur, provided the treatment was carried out with reasonable care and skill.

7. Disclaimer

  • Results: Individual results may vary. We cannot guarantee specific outcomes for any treatment.
  • Information Accuracy: While we strive to provide accurate information on our website and during consultations, we do not warrant the completeness or accuracy of this information.

8. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website.

9. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

Beauty Awakening by Chantelle
